---
order: 2
---

Loading

```html
<Button primary loading="{ loading1 }" on-click="{ loading1 = !loading1 }">{ loading1 ? 'Loading...' : 'Start' }</Button>
<Button outline loading="{ loading2 }" on-click="{ loading2 = !loading2 }">{ loading2 ? 'Loading...' : 'Start' }</Button>
<Button loading="{ loading3 }" on-click="{ loading3 = !loading3 }">{ loading3 ? 'Loading...' : 'Start' }</Button>
```
